overview:
Tony graduated with Honors from Regis University in Denver, Colorado with a Masterâ€™s Degree in Computer Engineering (emphasis in Network Engineering). Tony was honored by Regis for developing a published proposal on biometric security at all National Nuclear Power plants in collaboration with homeland security efforts.

Upon graduation, Tony was employed by a large medical company as a Senior Network Administrator for over 4 years. Tony helped depoly and maintain a network of over 200 users. In addition, Tony has extensive experience in the IT industry with over 10 years of experience.

When Tony isnt devoting his time to his clients and business, he enjoys spending time with his wife Tricia and his 3 children. “My plan is to live an honest life, treat people right, and good things will come”.
